mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_TYPE, MEMBER_STATUS, NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, PHOTO_NAME, PHOTO_PATH, COMPANY_NAME) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_type}, #{member_status}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone_number}, #{photo_name}, #{photo_path}, #{company_name})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE REMEMBERME = #{rememberMe} AND REMEMBERAGE > sysdate
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME = #{name}, PASSWORD = #{password}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phone_number}, PHOTO_NAME = #{photo_name}, PHOTO_PATH = #{photo_path} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
